oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aunt Sophie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Woman who is thought to be a former slave taken at the Crockett home in Brentwood, Tennessee. She was called Aunt Sophie. The back of the photograph the following information: "Aunt Sophie at the age of 106; she remembers the War of 1812. Picture was taken at Cousin Ossean Crockett's house."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
